name: Mission Me
description:
Enhance your creativity! Escape from boredom!
Gain awesome new life experiences!

Mission Me takes you on an entertaining real-life adventure of self-discovery and play in your real reality.

Improve your health and wellness while having fun. Get inspired to do new things and take positive action in your life!

Connect with your friends in playful ways (and make NEW friends too). Create hilarious fun with an entertaining excuse: "Mission Me made me do it!"

Don't be a robot. Make your life a true reality, that exudes passion for an authentic real life.

WARNING: Known side-effects include self-growth and happy relationships!

100% Free!

BACK-STORY:

Burning Man is a giant festival of experimental arts and culture. After attending for a good decade, it's taught me so much. It's an eye-opening experience of cutting-edge art, technology and cultural experimentation!

Burning Man encourages everyone to participate fully in the event, for a maximal experience. However, I witnessed that people sometimes needed a helping idea to get them started. Thus I created a Mission Me Machine and brought it back to Burning Man with me.

The Mission Me Machine is an interactive art sculpture that dispenses MISSIONS for people to take-on. It was designed to promote playful social contact, self-discovery, and artistic adventure! The Mission Me Machine has since travelled to a variety of art festivals along the west coast. Wherever it goes, it delights people by giving them fun and eclectic quests to accomplish!

So I decided it was time to create a digital version of the Mission Me Machine, so that everyone with a mobile phone could play and be inspired in their everyday life!

That's the origin story of this strange and wonderful app Mission Me!

Hope you like it :)

Art by digital visionary painter Mugwort.
Music by sonic alchemists YAIMA.
App created by Sillysoft Games.

Level up your life!

"Mission Me made me do it"
